duties_responsibilities.duty: Transform client maturity, improve control environments, and create new client offerings.
Define and lead engagements, sell meaningful services, and grow and manage a diverse team.
Influence, shape, and grow the Security Advisory practice, working with the North America Security Advisory Lead.
Drive multi-million sales and revenues and be responsible for achieving and building out a strong consultancy project pipeline.
Understand clients' security needs, solve unique problems, and work with clients from the earliest visions to the final experience.
Shape commercial models, risk, and go-to-market across a range of security capabilities including Strategy & GRC, IAM, Data Protection, and Cloud.

Shape, define, and guide transformative projects which enhance maturity, define strategy, solve technology issues, optimize business processes, provide assurance, strengthen controls, reduce security risk, and enable new secure ways of working.
Help drive industry-aligned focus, bringing together GTM offerings and taking them to industry verticals via sales teams.
Grow and nurture internal talent, passing on knowledge and experience to create the leaders of the future.
Hire consulting specialists, ex-technologists, people from industry, pre-sales architects, academics, and those who have branched out.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Cyber Security, Computer Science, IT, or a related field (Master's preferred)
